verses.verse: When <S%H3588><s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> hath <S%H3947>taken<s%> a <S%H802>wife,<s%> and <S%H1166>married<s%> her, and it come to <S%H1961>pass<s%> <S%H518>that<s%> she <S%H4672>find<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H2580>favor<s%> in his <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> he hath <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H1697>some<s%> <S%H6172>uncleanness<s%> in her: then let him <S%H3789>write<s%> her a <S%H5612>bill<s%> of <S%H3748>divorcement,<s%> and <S%H5414>give<s%> it in her <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and <S%H7971>send<s%> her out of his <S%H4480>house.<s%> <S%H1004><s%>
And when she is <S%H3318>departed<s%> out of his <S%H4480>house,<s%> <S%H1004><s%> she may <S%H1980>go<s%> and <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H312>another<s%> <S%H376>man's<s%> wife.

And if the <S%H314>latter<s%> <S%H376>husband<s%> <S%H8130>hate<s%> her, and <S%H3789>write<s%> her a <S%H5612>bill<s%> of <S%H3748>divorcement,<s%> and <S%H5414>giveth<s%> it in her <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and <S%H7971>sendeth<s%> her out of his <S%H4480>house;<s%> <S%H1004><s%> <S%H176>or<s%> <S%H3588>if<s%> the <S%H314>latter<s%> <S%H376>husband<s%> <S%H4191>die,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> her to be his <S%H802>wife;<s%>

Her <S%H7223>former<s%> <S%H1167>husband,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> sent her <S%H7971>away,<s%> <S%H3201>may<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H3947>take<s%> her <S%H7725>again<s%> to <S%H1961>be<s%> his <S%H802>wife,<s%> after <S%H310>that<s%> <S%H834><s%> she is <S%H2930>defiled;<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H1931>that<s%> is <S%H8441>abomination<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> and thou shalt <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H853>cause<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> to <S%H2398>sin,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5414>giveth<s%> thee for an <S%H5159>inheritance.<s%>

When <S%H3588><s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> hath <S%H3947>taken<s%> a <S%H2319>new<s%> <S%H802>wife,<s%> he shall <S%H3808>not<s%> go <S%H3318>out<s%> to <S%H6635>war,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> shall he be <S%H5674>charged<s%> <S%H5921>with<s%> <S%H3605>any<s%> <S%H1697>business:<s%> but he shall <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H5355>free<s%> at <S%H1004>home<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H8141>year,<s%> and shall cheer <S%H8055>up<s%> <S%H853><s%> his <S%H802>wife<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he hath <S%H3947>taken.<s%>

No <S%H3808><s%> man shall <S%H2254>take<s%> the <S%H7347>nether<s%> or the <S%H7393>upper<s%> <S%H7347>millstone<s%> to <S%H2254>pledge:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H1931>he<s%> <S%H2254>taketh<s%> a man's <S%H5315>life<s%> to <S%H2254>pledge.<s%>

If <S%H3588><s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> be <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H1589>stealing<s%> <S%H5315>any<s%> of his <S%H4480>brethren<s%> <S%H251><s%> of the <S%H4480>children<s%> <S%H1121><s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and maketh <S%H6014>merchandise<s%> of him, or <S%H4376>selleth<s%> him; then <S%H1931>that<s%> <S%H1590>thief<s%> shall <S%H4191>die;<s%> and thou shalt put evil <S%H1197>away<s%> <S%H7451><s%> from <S%H4480>among<s%> <S%H7130><s%> you.

Take <S%H8104>heed<s%> in the <S%H5061>plague<s%> of <S%H6883>leprosy,<s%> that thou <S%H8104>observe<s%> <S%H3966>diligently,<s%> and <S%H6213>do<s%> according to <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> the <S%H3548>priests<s%> the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> shall <S%H3384>teach<s%> you: <S%H834>as<s%> I <S%H6680>commanded<s%> them, so ye shall <S%H8104>observe<s%> to <S%H6213>do.<s%>

Remember <S%H2142><s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H834>what<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> unto <S%H4813>Miriam<s%> by the <S%H1870>way,<s%> after that ye were come <S%H3318>forth<s%> out of <S%H4480>Egypt.<s%> <S%H4714><s%>

When <S%H3588><s%> thou dost <S%H5383>lend<s%> thy <S%H7453>brother<s%> <S%H3972>any<s%> <S%H4859>thing,<s%> thou shalt <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H935>go<s%> <S%H413>into<s%> his <S%H1004>house<s%> to <S%H5670>fetch<s%> his <S%H5667>pledge.<s%>

Thou shalt <S%H5975>stand<s%> <S%H2351>abroad,<s%> and the <S%H376>man<s%> to <S%H834>whom<s%> <S%H859>thou<s%> dost <S%H5383>lend<s%> shall bring <S%H3318>out<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H5667>pledge<s%> <S%H2351>abroad<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> thee.
And <S%H518>if<s%> the <S%H376>man<s%> be <S%H6041>poor,<s%> thou shalt <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H7901>sleep<s%> with his pledge: <S%H5667><s%>

In any case thou shalt <S%H7725>deliver<s%> <S%H7725><s%> <S%H853>him<s%> the <S%H5667>pledge<s%> again when the <S%H8121>sun<s%> goeth <S%H935>down,<s%> that he may <S%H7901>sleep<s%> in his own <S%H8008>raiment,<s%> and <S%H1288>bless<s%> thee: and it shall <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> unto thee <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God.<s%>

Thou shalt <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H6231>oppress<s%> a hired <S%H7916>servant<s%> that is <S%H6041>poor<s%> and <S%H34>needy,<s%> whether he be of thy <S%H4480>brethren,<s%> <S%H251><s%> <S%H176>or<s%> of thy <S%H4480>strangers<s%> <S%H1616><s%> <S%H834>that<s%> are in thy <S%H776>land<s%> within thy gates: <S%H8179><s%>

At his <S%H3117>day<s%> thou shalt <S%H5414>give<s%> him his <S%H7939>hire,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> shall the <S%H8121>sun<s%> go <S%H935>down<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> it; <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H1931>he<s%> is <S%H6041>poor,<s%> and <S%H5375>setteth<s%> <S%H853><s%> his <S%H5315>heart<s%> <S%H413>upon<s%> it: <S%H3808>lest<s%> he <S%H7121>cry<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> thee <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and it <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H2399>sin<s%> unto thee.

The <S%H1>fathers<s%> shall <S%H3808>not<s%> be put to <S%H4191>death<s%> <S%H5921>for<s%> the <S%H1121>children,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> shall the <S%H1121>children<s%> be put to <S%H4191>death<s%> <S%H5921>for<s%> the <S%H1>fathers:<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> shall be put to <S%H4191>death<s%> for his own <S%H2399>sin.<s%>

Thou shalt <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H5186>pervert<s%> the <S%H4941>judgment<s%> of the <S%H1616>stranger,<s%> nor of the <S%H3490>fatherless;<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H2254>take<s%> a <S%H490>widow's<s%> <S%H899>raiment<s%> to pledge: <S%H2254><s%>

But thou shalt <S%H2142>remember<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> thou <S%H1961>wast<s%> a <S%H5650>bondman<s%> in <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> and the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H6299>redeemed<s%> thee <S%H4480>thence:<s%> <S%H8033><s%> <S%H5921>therefore<s%> <S%H3651><s%> <S%H595>I<s%> <S%H6680>command<s%> thee to <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1697>thing.<s%>

When <S%H3588><s%> thou cuttest <S%H7114>down<s%> thine <S%H7105>harvest<s%> in thy <S%H7704>field,<s%> and hast <S%H7911>forgot<s%> a <S%H6016>sheaf<s%> in the <S%H7704>field,<s%> thou shalt <S%H3808>not<s%> go <S%H7725>again<s%> to <S%H3947>fetch<s%> it: it shall <S%H1961>be<s%> for the <S%H1616>stranger,<s%> for the <S%H3490>fatherless,<s%> and for the <S%H490>widow:<s%> <S%H4616>that<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> may <S%H1288>bless<s%> thee in <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4639>work<s%> of thine <S%H3027>hands.<s%>

When <S%H3588><s%> thou <S%H2251>beatest<s%> thine olive <S%H2132>tree,<s%> thou shalt <S%H3808>not<s%> go over the <S%H6286>boughs<s%> <S%H310>again:<s%> it shall <S%H1961>be<s%> for the <S%H1616>stranger,<s%> for the <S%H3490>fatherless,<s%> and for the <S%H490>widow.<s%>

When <S%H3588><s%> thou gatherest the <S%H1219>grapes<s%> of thy <S%H3754>vineyard,<s%> thou shalt <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H5953>glean<s%> it <S%H310>afterward:<s%> it shall <S%H1961>be<s%> for the <S%H1616>stranger,<s%> for the <S%H3490>fatherless,<s%> and for the <S%H490>widow.<s%>

And thou shalt <S%H2142>remember<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> thou <S%H1961>wast<s%> a <S%H5650>bondman<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt:<s%> <S%H5921>therefore<s%> <S%H3651><s%> <S%H595>I<s%> <S%H6680>command<s%> thee to <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1697>thing.<s%>
